snippet: The state has agreed not to enforce a provision of its immigration law that required state officials to publish a list of people known to be unlawfully in the country.
abstract: Alabama agrees not to enforce provision of its immigration law requiring state officials to publish list of people known to be unlawfully in country, as lawyers reach settlement in suit challenging measure.
lead_paragraph: The state has agreed not to enforce a provision of its immigration law that required state officials to publish a list of people known to be unlawfully in the country.

headline.main: Alabama: Deal Ends Plan to Publish Names of Arrested Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Deal Ends Plan to Publish Names of Arrested Immigrants
